definitions.definition: A long , thin , sharp implement usually for piercing as in sewing , embroidery , acupuncture , tattooing , body piercing , medical injections , sutures , etc; or a blunt but otherwise similar implement used for forming loops or knots in crafts such as darning , knitting , tatting , etc.
examples: The seamstress threaded the needle to sew on a button.

definitions.definition: Any slender, pointed object resembling a needle, such as a pointed crystal , a sharp pinnacle of rock , an obelisk , etc.
A fine measurement indicator on a dial or graph .
examples: The needle on the fuel gauge pointed to empty.

definitions.definition: A sensor for playing phonograph records , a phonograph stylus .
examples: Ziggy bought some diamond needles for his hi-fi phonograph.

definitions.definition: A needle-like leaf found on some conifers .
A strong beam resting on props, used as a temporary support during building repairs.
The death penalty carried out by lethal injection .
A text string that is searched for within another string. (see: needle in a haystack )
Any of various species of damselfly of the genus Synlestes , endemic to Australia.
A move in which the performer begins with two hands and one leg on the floor, then kicks the other leg into a full split.

main_definition: A long , thin , sharp implement usually for piercing as in sewing , embroidery , acupuncture , tattooing , body piercing , medical injections , sutures , etc; or a blunt but otherwise similar implement used for forming loops or knots in crafts such as darning , knitting , tatting , etc.
secondary_definitions: Any slender, pointed object resembling a needle, such as a pointed crystal , a sharp pinnacle of rock , an obelisk , etc.
A fine measurement indicator on a dial or graph .

A needle-like leaf found on some conifers .
A strong beam resting on props, used as a temporary support during building repairs.

( entomology ) Any of various species of damselfly of the genus Synlestes , endemic to Australia.
( gymnastics ) A move in which the performer begins with two hands and one leg on the floor, then kicks the other leg into a full split.
